title: David Silva: Tributes to retiring Man City legend
title_page: David Silva: Tributes to retiring Man City legend - BBC Sport
maintext:
Former Manchester City team-mates have been quick to pay tribute to David Silva after he announced his retirement from football aged 37.
Silva's former captain Vincent Kompany said: "Thank you for all those wonderful moments David. You were so special and it was an honour to share the pitch and the dressing room with you! Life isnâ€™t so bad after football, more good times to come!"
Riyad Mahrez: "Magic".
Kyle Walker labelled Silva the 'goat' and added: "The magician. Was a pleasure my friend."
Aymeric Laporte: "Legend. Thank you for everything."
Raheem Sterling said simply: "The Best."
Leroy Sane: "Legend."
Joleon Lescott: "It was an honour amigo."
Edin Dzeko: "Thank you magician."
Pablo Zabaleta: "Legend. Thank you for everything David."
